name: The Jets
description: '''The Jets''' are a Tongan-American family band from [[Robbinsdale, Minnesota|Robbinsdale]], a suburb of [[Minneapolis]], Minnesota. The Jets are composed of brothers and sisters LeRoy, Eddie, Eugene, Haini, Rudy, Kathi, Elizabeth, and Moana Wolfgramm, who perform [[Pop music|pop]], [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]], and [[dance music]]. They started performing as a family band in 1977. The group enjoyed worldwide success in 1985â€“1990, performing three world tours, and producing five top-10 hits on the US [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]].
